#### Welcome to my website!
***
Jiaxin has been awarded a studentship funded by the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC) South West Doctoral Training Partnership ([SWDTP](https://www.swdtp.ac.uk/)) in 2024 and will begin her first year as a doctoral student in September, focusing on [the co-occurrence of antisocial behaviour and substance use](https://researchportal.bath.ac.uk/en/projects/co-occurrence-of-antisocial-behaviour-and-substance-use-from-adol) in the Department of Psychology at the University of Bath.  
Her research interests focus on understanding the development of psychopathy and antisocial behaviour using multiple quantitative methods and statistical techniques. She is also interested in interdisciplinary research to discover the application of data science in clinical psychology and personality assessment.
